text: refsplitr: author name disambiguation, author georeferencing, mapping coauthorship networks Web Science data. refsplitr (v1.0) R package parse organize reference records downloaded Web Science citation database, disambiguate names authors, geocode locations, generate/visualize coauthorship networks. Web Science (WOS) toll-access literature citation database maintained Clarivate Analytics indexes articles ~12,000 academic journals. WOS records include diversity data article (e.g., article title, journal name, author names, author addresses, number times article cited, funding sources), making useful studying patterns scientific productivity, coauthorship, research impact, Science Science topics. bulk WOS records API access WOS expensive, researchers WOS-subscribing institutions often gather data conducting WOS searches downloading reference records batches. However, requires cumbersome process extracting, merging, correcting data downloaded records prior conducting analyses. refsplitr rapidly merge process reference data files downloaded WOS, process organize format amenable use scientometric, social network, Science Science analyses. Support development refsplitr provided grants University Florida Center Latin American Studies University Florida Informatics Institute.
